column1: ConditionsAll existing traffic and parking controls and restrictionsshall apply without a Special Traffic Permit issued bySFMTA. Please check Blue Book for traffic restrictions.To obtain a Blue Book, contact SFMTA at 415-701-4673.No noise permitted between the hours of 7:00PM and7:00AM.Event/Operation:aerial utility workPermit Linear Footage40Elements of Occupancyline truck/boom truck roving from utility pole to utilitypole placing aerial strand and fiber optic cable.  rovingwork not to exceed approximately 30 minutes at eachlocation.From:2/27/2017 07:00AMStart Time7:00AMTo:3/10/2017 05:00PMEnd Time05:00PMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, followthe tow-away sign activation and photo uploadprocess.  To tow a vehicle call the Tow Desk at (415)553-1200.Special Traffic permit requiredCALL FOR Special traffic permit MAY BE required(Please check DPT Blue Book for any trafficrestrictions; to obtain a "Blue Book", please contactMTA at (415) 701-4673).Food:NOther:Performing Arts:NStreet Space Hours7:00AM Thru 05:00PMMeter Segment(s)Night NoiseWork Scope

column2: - Bike corral present.  The Contractor shall contact Ryan Dodge of theSFMTA at ryan.dodge@sfmta.com if an on-street bicycle parking corralmay potentially conflict with the Contractor’s work or if theContractor’s work may potentially damage the on-street bicycle parkingcorral. Ryan Dodge will provide details and cost estimates payable bythe Contractor if removal and re-installation is required.
- Bike Share Station.  Please contactconstruction@bayareabikeshare.com and bikeshare@sfmta.com cc tocoordinate.
- Parking sensors are located in the parking spaces on this street.Please contact Alex Demisch of SFMTA/SFpark at (415) 701-4507 oralex.demisch@sfmta.com to coordinate

column4: Prior to construction, all CCSFsurvey monuments shall bereferenced by a licensed LandSurveyor on a Corner Record ora Record of Survey if anyconstruction will take placewithin 10 ft of a monument. Forany questions, please emailMonument.Preservation@sfdpw.org or call 415-554-5827.Note, all survey monumentsshall be preserved per state lawand disturbance of a surveymonument may be a crime.

Prior to construction, all CCSFsurvey monuments shall bereferenced by a licensed LandSurveyor on a Corner Record ora Record of Survey if anyconstruction will take placewithin 10 ft of a monument. Forany questions, please emailMonument.Preservation@sfdpw.org or call 415-554-5827.Note, all survey monumentsshall be preserved per state lawand disturbance of a surveymonument may be a crime.
